CrestfallenHome.CrestfallenMage:
The Great Book of ECMAScript has been captured.
All I have left is this tattered page.

It is said that a wizard in the north can release the book.
If only I could decipher the runes on this tattered page.
Perhaps you can try?

You've freed the Great Book!
Oh Hero, a great journey awaits you.
It is said the Great book can open many doors.
Go east!
